page.title: 17NEWSPAPERS/LIBRARY: GARTMORE
page.content:
Many people read the daily{Glasgow {Herald}and the{Stirling Observer}which comes out every Friday. Our papers are delivered by car.
{Gartmore News}- Gartmore has its own newspaper which comes out once a month seven people help with editing, typing and printing, and the "Gartmore News" includes articles about village life in the past, letters, information about activities, and reports from the organisations.
{Library van}- The Library van comes from Stirling, every second Friday and every other Tuesday. There are about 3000 books in the van and 3000 out to borrowers. It stays from 3.00- 4.15pm. There are two people on the van, a librarian and a driver.
